hero.title: French courses in East London
hero.subtitle: We help children discover the French language and culture while having fun! Whether your child is a beginner or already has some basics, our interactive classes allow them to learn and grow while thriving.

learning.title: A joyful and immersive learning experience
learning.text: At Les Petits Bilingues de Newham, we offer an enjoyable and interactive learning experience that allows children to thrive at their own pace. Through playful methods and cultural immersion, we help children discover the pleasure of learning French.

1.title: A playful method
1.desc: Learning through games, songs, and creative activities.

2.title: Cultural immersion
2.desc: Discovering not only the language but also French traditions and culture.

3.title: A supportive environment
3.desc: Learning in a warm and welcoming environment where children feel comfortable.

4.title: Interactive classes
4.desc: Participating in dynamic lessons filled with games and discussions to actively learn.

5.title: Sustainable learning
5.desc: Developing language skills that will stay with them throughout their life.
